title: SOLD: PC796 Sepia Hal Chase, SGC 3
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: SOLD: PC796 Sepia Hal Chase, SGC 3
posts.post_content:
Fine example of a tough card from this popular set of postcards.  Recently graded a 3 VG by SGC.  Combined population reports from PSA and SGC total 8, with only 3 of a higher grade.  Great image of a very popular player as well.

SOLD delivered, net to me, with PayPal F/F preferred.  Please PM me or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Thanks!
